languages.text: "Но тех, кто старается, кто не пускает семя зла в свое сердце, вознаграждает Он новой судьбой, новой жизнью, выше и лучше прежней — поворотом своего Ключа отперев темницу их души. Я живу надеждой, что однажды Он подойдет и к моей двери". {n}Мейв улыбается — печально, покорно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но тех, кто старается, кто не пускает семя зла в свое сердце, вознаграждает Он новой судьбой, новой жизнью, выше и лучше прежней — поворотом своего Ключа отперев темницу их души. Я живу надеждой, что однажды Он подойдет и к моей двери". {n}Лидзи улыбается — печально, покорно.{/n} "Наверное, обычной служанке не пристало грезить о такой чести. Но иногда надежда — это все, что у нас есть".

languages.text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но тех, кто старается, кто не пускает семя зла в свое сердце, вознаграждает Он новой судьбой, новой жизнью, выше и лучше прежней — поворотом своего Ключа отперев темницу их души. Я живу надеждой, что однажды Он подойдет и к моей двери". {n}Мейв улыбается — печально, покорно.{/n}

I live in hope that one day He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

I live in hope that one day He will come to my door." {n}Lidzy's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

I live in hope that one day He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

"But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

languages.text: “然而，那些努力奋斗的人，那些坚守内心、不受邪恶种子诱惑的人，祂便会赐予他们新的命运，奖励他们更加美好的新生活。祂会转动手中的钥匙，将那些人的灵魂从牢笼中释放。我衷心希望有朝一日，祂也会来到我的门前。”{n}梅芙露出了悲伤、无奈的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “然而，那些努力奋斗的人，那些坚守内心、不受邪恶种子诱惑的人，祂便会赐予他们新的命运，奖励他们更加美好的新生活。祂会转动手中的钥匙，将那些人的灵魂从牢笼中释放。我衷心希望有朝一日，祂也会来到我的门前。”{n}梅芙露出了悲伤、无奈的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero a quienes se esfuerzan, a quienes no permiten que la semilla del mal arraigue en su corazón, Él los recompensará con un nuevo destino, una vida mejor y más importante que la anterior; con un solo giro de Su Llave puede abrir la mazmorra del alma. Vivo con la esperanza de que algún día llame a la puerta de mi mazmorra». {n}La sonrisa de Maive está cargada de tristeza y resignación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero a quienes se esfuerzan, a quienes no permiten que la semilla del mal arraigue en su corazón, Él los recompensará con un nuevo destino, una vida mejor y más importante que la anterior; con un solo giro de Su Llave puede abrir la mazmorra del alma. Vivo con la esperanza de que algún día llame a la puerta de mi mazmorra». {n}La sonrisa de Maive está cargada de tristeza y resignación.{/n}

languages.text: "Ancak çabalayanları, kalplerine kötülük tohumunun girmesine izin vermeyenleri yeni bir kaderle, eskisinden daha yüksek ve daha iyi yeni bir hayatla ödüllendirirmiş. Anahtarı'nı çevirip ruhlarının zindanını açarmış. Bir gün kapıma geleceği umuduyla yaşıyorum." {n}Maive, hüzünlü kabullenişini ifade eden bir gülümseme takınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ancak çabalayanları, kalplerine kötülük tohumunun girmesine izin vermeyenleri yeni bir kaderle, eskisinden daha yüksek ve daha iyi yeni bir hayatla ödüllendirirmiş. Anahtarı'nı çevirip ruhlarının zindanını açarmış. Bir gün kapıma geleceği umuduyla yaşıyorum." {n}Maive, hüzünlü kabullenişini ifade eden bir gülümseme takınıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「しかし、努力する者、邪悪の種をその心に許さない者には、陛下が鍵を回すと新たな運命、新たな人生、以前よりもより高い、より優れたものが与えられ、魂の迷宮から解放されるのです。いつの日か、陛下が私のドアに来てくださることを望んで生きています」{n}メイヴの笑顔は哀しい服従の一つである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、努力する者、邪悪の種をその心に許さない者には、陛下が鍵を回すと新たな運命、新たな人生、以前よりもより高い、より優れたものが与えられ、魂の迷宮から解放されるのです。いつの日か、陛下が私のドアに来てくださることを望んで生きています」{n}メイヴの笑顔は哀しい服従の一つである。{/n}

languages.text: « Mais à ceux qui luttent et qui ne laissent pas la graine du mal germer dans leur cœur, Il offre un nouveau destin, une nouvelle vie, meilleure que la précédente. D'un tour de Sa clé, Il déverrouille le donjon de leur âme. Je vis dans l'espoir qu'un jour, Il viendra ouvrir ma porte. » {n}Le sourire de Maive est résigné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais à ceux qui luttent et qui ne laissent pas la graine du mal germer dans leur cœur, Il offre un nouveau destin, une nouvelle vie, meilleure que la précédente. D'un tour de Sa clé, Il déverrouille le donjon de leur âme. Je vis dans l'espoir qu'un jour, Il viendra ouvrir ma porte. » {n}Le sourire de Maive est résigné.{/n}

languages.text: "Doch wer sich bemüht, wer die Saat des Bösen nicht in sein Herz lässt, den belohnt Er mit einem neuen Schicksal, einem neuen Leben, höher und besser als das vorherigen. Mit nur einer Drehung Seines Schlüssels öffnet Er die Verliese unserer Seelen. Ich lebe in der Hoffnung, dass Er eines Tages auch vor meiner Tür stehen wird." {n}Maives Lächeln ist von trauriger Resignation erfüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But those who strive, who do not let the seed of evil into their hearts, He will reward with a new destiny, a new life, higher and better than the one before — with a turn of His Key, he unlocks the dungeon of their souls. I live in hope that, one day, He will come to my door." {n}Maive's smile is one of sad resignation.{/n}

Mit nur einer Drehung Seines Schlüssels öffnet Er die Verliese unserer Seelen. Ich lebe in der Hoffnung, dass Er eines Tages auch vor meiner Tür stehen wird." {n}Maives Lächeln ist von trauriger Resignation erfüllt.{/n}
